class music.Note(pitch, duration, dynamic=None, articulation=None)[source]¶

Bases: music._Music

Class representing the smallest unit for the Pitcher. :param pitch: Pitch() class :param duration: note duration :param dynamic: dynamic, such as piano, forte, crescendo, etc :param articulation: articulation, such as staccato, accent, fermata, etc

class music.Part(staffs=None, tempo=None, time_signature=None, key_signature=None)[source]¶

Bases: music._Music

A collection of staffs. Add effects / stanza-chorus / key/time changes to parts. Should affect its children.
